title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Don’t be afraid to break the rules because rules are made to be broken!Breaking the rules will be so much fun because a prize pool of up to EUR 1,250,000 awaits you! So join the newest campaign offering of Betplay.io, the Wazdan Breaks the Rules tournament! This is a 92-day network event full of fun and prizes. We guarantee you that this is a campaign you don't want to miss!The entertaining competition will be held from 5/15 at 9:00 a.m. CET to 8/15 at 11:59 p.m. CET. For this promotion, there is no minimum stake. Money drops happen at random. You are eligible for as many prize drops as you want!To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games in the list: All Wazdan slots including top-performing titles: 9 Coins, Hot Slot: 777 Cash Out, Hot Slot: 777 Rubies, Fortune Reels, Dwarfs Fortune.Get a taste of the excitement! Entertaining games abound! If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service.Betplay.ioThe #1 Bitcoin Lightning Casino
